product_name: The North Face Base Camp Duffel Special Edition - Medium - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Base Camp Duffel Special Edition in medium offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware. Medium 72-liter duffel provides storage for trips of 2 - 4 days. Made from heavy-duty 300-denier phthalate-free thermoplastic elastomer laminate and 840-denier ballistics nylon, this duffel is ready for anything you can dish at it. Features rugged construction with extra bar tacks, double stitching and durable metal hardware. Linenlike embossing adds textural interest to the shell material; leather accents are featured on haul handles, shoulder straps and ID window. Main compartment features a D-shaped zippered opening with zipper flap; internal mesh pockets offer organization. Duffel-style handles and haul handles on ends provide carrying options; shaped shoulder straps provide comfortable, easy hauling as a backpack. The North Face Base Camp Duffel in medium has 4 side compression straps and dual daisy chains along sides. Zippers are travel-lock compatible (locks not included). Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Base Camp Duffel Special Edition in medium offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware.
